plot outline: A young man returns home years after he ran away. He tries to win over his childhood love, but she is in love with someone else; his brother implicates the girl's lover in a murder and sends him to jail.Story revolves around the guilty husband and innocent wife.
title: Sundara Purushan
plot: A young man returns home years after he ran away. He tries to win over his childhood love, but she is in love with someone else; his brother implicates the girl's lover in a murder and sends him to jail.Story revolves around the guilty husband and innocent wife.::Google User
